channel.title: Mysql help
channel.description:
hi guys im adding highscores to my server, i think i have done most of it but i jsut have 1 problem.
i have a databasepool.java implented into my server and when i run my server it tells me in my cmd that the databasepool has successfully connected to my websites database. now then i added in all the stuff to update highscores to website, and i made a command in order to update highscores, but when i type the command to update highscores it says in my cmd " error connecting, could not save highscores"
i don't understand why its not updating if the databasepool is alredy connected fine?
